japanese: よかった、熱も下がったな。
translation: Your fever has gone down. Good.

japanese:
うん、ぐっすり眠らせてもらったし、
もう元気いっぱいだよ。
translation:
Yeah, I slept really well,
and I feel completely fine now.

japanese:
君がずっと看病してくれたおかげ。
本当にありがとう。
translation:
Thanks for taking care of me all this time.
I couldn't have done it without you.

japanese:
俺は別になにもしてないけどな。
ただ、ここに座ってただけだ。
translation:
Oh, don't say that.
I didn't do anything special.
I just sat here with you.

japanese:
そんなことないよ。
すぐに良くなったのは、
君がずっと手を握ってくれてたからだもん。
translation:
No, that's not true.
You helped me a lot by holding my hand the whole time.

japanese:
あー……。
つ、つまり、お前のお母さんのおまじないは
効果てきめんってことだな。
translation: Ah... I guess your mother's charm really worked

japanese: ふふっ、そうだね。
translation: Teehee, yeah, it seems so.

japanese:
とはいえ、完全に治るまで油断は禁物だ。
もうしばらく安静にして、して欲しいことが
あったら遠慮なく言ってくれ。
translation:
However, you still need to be careful
and take it easy until you're completely better.
If there's anything you need, just let me know.

japanese: はーい。
translation: Okay.

japanese:
じゃあ、なにか食べたいかな。
体調が良くなって食欲が戻ってきたみたい。
translation:
So, do you want something to eat?
It seems like your appetite has come back
now that you're feeling better.

japanese: まあ、ルームサービスでもいいんだけど……。
translation: Well, I'm fine with room service...

japanese:
いや、俺が買ってきてやるよ。
食いたいものはあるか？
translation:
Nah, I'll go buy something.
Is there something you want?

japanese: パッとは思いつかないから、君に任せる。
translation:
I don't have anything specific in mind,
so it's up to you.

japanese:
わかった、適当に見繕ってみる。
もしなんかあったらすぐ連絡しろよ？
translation:
Alright, I'll pick something out.
Contact me if something happens, okay?

japanese:
じゃ、お願いします。
フータロー君のチョイス、楽しみにしてるね。
translation:
Thanks, I'm looking forward to see 
what you'll end up getting me.

japanese: 試されてるみたいで緊張するな。
translation:
I'm a little nervous.
I feel like I'm being tested.

japanese: さて。
translation: Let's see.

japanese:
（なにを買ってくればいいんだろうな。
　大分元気になってきてるとはいえ病人だし、
　消化にいいものが定番か――）
translation:
(Hmm, I should probably get
 something easy to digest
 since she's still recovering%p-2;――%p;)

japanese:
（ん？　メール？
　……らいはか）
translation:
(Hmm? A text message?
 From Raiha, eh.)

japanese:
おきなわワールドの次にガンガラーの谷へ
行く予定だったんだけど、やめにしちゃった。
やっぱり一花さんのことが心配だから。
translation:
We were supposed to go to the Valley of Gangala
after Okinawa World, but we cancelled it
because we're still worried about Ichika-san.

japanese:
これから国際通りでお見舞いをいっぱい買って
ホテルに戻ります。
translation:
We're going to buy a lot of souvenirs on Kokusai dori
and then head back to the hotel.

japanese:
（あいつら、結局、戻ってくるのか。
　……まあそりゃ心配だよな）
translation:
(I guess they're coming back after all.
 ...Well, I can understand their concern.)

japanese:
いろんなお店でご飯を買って帰るから、
まだ食べないで待っててね！
translation:
We're gonna buy a lot of food and come back,
so don't eat, and wait for us!

japanese:
（そういうことなら、買い出しは必要なさそうだな。
　あいつらの好意に甘えるか）
translation:
(If that's the case,
 it seems like I don't need to go shopping.
 Should I take advantage of their kindness?)

japanese:
ただいま。
一花、飯のことなんだが――
translation:
I'm home.
Ichika, about dinner%p-2;――

japanese: へ？
translation: Huh?
Ah...

japanese:
えええええっ！？
ちょ、ちょ、なんで戻ってくるのさ！？
translation:
WHAAAAA?!
Wh-h-wh-wh-why did you come back?!

japanese:
な、なんでってここは俺の部屋だし！？
じゃ、じゃなくて、すまんっ！！
translation:
Wh-why? Because this is my room!
I-I mean, I'm sorry!

japanese:
こっち見ない！　回れ右っ！
とりあえずバスルームへ行って！
translation:
Don't look at me!
Turn right! Just go to the bathroom for now!

japanese: わ、わかった！
translation: G-got it!

japanese: はぁぁぁぁ……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese:
やっぱりバスルームで着替えればよかったぁ。
油断しちゃった……。
translation:
I should have changed in the bathroom after all.
I let my guard down...

japanese:
フータロー君。
もう出てきてもいいよ。
translation: Futaro-kun, you can come out now.

japanese: お、おう。
translation: O-okay.

japanese:
一花すまんっ！！　この通りだ！
まさか着替えてるとは思ってなくて！！
translation:
I'm sorry, Ichika!! 
I didn't think you'd be changing!

japanese:
だ、大丈夫。
そんなに必死に頭下げなくていいから。
translation: I-it's okay. You don't have to bow so much.

japanese:
こっちも、私だけじゃなくて
君とらいはちゃんの部屋でもあるのに
堂々と着替えちゃってたし、おあいこだよ。
translation:
I'm in the wrong too. I started changing in 
you and Raiha-chan's room,
without asking. It's all good.

japanese:
あはは……。
なんていうか、あるあるなハプニングだなぁ。
translation:
Ahaha...
This is such a typical thing 
you would imagine happening, huh.

japanese:
あるあるか？
つか、あっちゃダメだろ。
translation:
Typical?
But it's better not to have such an accident, right?

japanese: あ、ああ、そうだね。
translation: R-right. Sorry.

japanese:
なんていうか、将来的にありそうだから
早めに体験できて良かったかなーなんて……。
translation:
What I meant was, it might happen in the future,
so it's good to experience it earlier...
or something like that.

japanese: は？　なんの話だ？
translation: Huh? What are you talking about?

japanese:
へっ！？
私、なんか言ってた？
translation:
Wha?!
Did I say something?

japanese:
将来的にあるとかなんとか言ってなかったか？
よく聞こえなかったが。
translation:
Didn't you say something
about it happening in the future?
I didn't hear you clearly.

japanese: ち、違うよ！
translation: N-no!

japanese:
（やば、声に出しちゃってた。
　同棲したいって話、まだできてないのに）
translation:
(Oh no, I said it out loud.
 We haven't even talked about moving in together yet.)

japanese:
だからなんだよ、さっきから。
言いたいことがあるならはっきり言えって。
translation:
What's your matter?
You've been acting weird for a while now.
If you have something to say, just say it clearly.

japanese: それは、そのぅ……。
translation: Well, umm...

japanese:
えっ！？
だ、誰か来た？
translation:
Huh?!
I-is someone coming?

japanese: あ、ああ、多分らいは達だ。
translation: Y-yeah, it's probably Raiha and your sisters.

japanese: ただいまー！
translation: We're back!

japanese: おう、おかえり。
translation: Ah, welcome back.

japanese:
ただいま戻りました。
一花、調子はどうですか？
translation:
We're back.
How are you feeling, Ichika?

japanese: あれ？　なんでみんな……。
translation: Huh? Why is everyone...?

japanese: よかった、元気そうだね一花さん。
translation: You seem better now, Ichika-san. Good.

japanese:
あ、うん。
フータロー君がずっと看病してくれたおかげで、
もう元気だよ。
translation:
Ah, yes.
Thanks to Futaro-kun taking care of me the whole time,
I'm feeling much better.

japanese: 熱も下がったしな。
translation: Her fever went down, too.

japanese: そうですか、安心しました。
translation: I'm glad to hear that.

japanese:
ふぅん？　もう元気ねぇ。
まだ顔が赤いけど？
translation:
Hmm? Are you really feeling better?
But your face is still red?

japanese:
えっ！？
そ、そんなこと……。
translation:
Huh?!
Th-that's...

japanese: フータローも顔が赤い。
translation: Your face is red too, Futaro.

japanese:
気のせいじゃないか？
はははは……。
translation:
Maybe it's just your imagination.
Hahahaha...

japanese:
なにがあったのかしら？
正直に言ってごらんなさい？
translation: What happened? Tell us honestly, would you?

japanese:
なにもなかったよ！
ねえ、フータロー君？
translation:
Nothing happened!
Right, Futaro-kun?

japanese: おう、なにもないぞ！
translation: Yeah, nothing happened!

japanese:
そ、それより！
なんでみんな帰ってきてるの？
予定だとまだ観光中だよね？
translation:
A-anyway, why is everyone back already?
Weren't you all still sightseeing?

japanese: あれ？　上杉さんから聞いてない？
translation: Huh? Didn't you hear from Uesugi-san?

japanese:
やはり一花のことが心配で、
途中で切り上げてきたんです。
translation:
We were worried about you, Ichika,
so we decided to cut the trip short.

japanese: その話をする前に、お前らが帰ってきたんだ。
translation:
Well, before we could talk about that,
you all came back.

japanese: あ！　でもちゃんと観光、楽しんできたからね？
translation: Ah! But anyway, we enjoyed our sightseeing, you know?

japanese: それに、沖縄ならここでも楽しめる。
translation:
Yeah, we did!
Also, we can enjoy Okinawa in this room, too.

japanese: ここで？
translation: In this room?

japanese:
じゃじゃーん、こういうこと！
国際通りで食べ物をいっぱい
テイクアウトしてきたんだ！
translation:
Ta-dah! THIS is what we mean!
We bought a lot of food from Kokusai dori!

japanese:
今日は予定を変更して、
部屋でゆっくり沖縄グルメを堪能しよう。
translation:
Today, we changed our plans
and decided to enjoy Okinawan cuisine in the room.
Wha...!

japanese:
食欲はありますか？
もしまだないようなら、
軽く食べられそうなものも買ってきていますから。
translation:
How's your appetite?
If it's still a little weak,
we also bought some light snacks.

japanese:
ううん！　むしろ、めっちゃお腹空いてる！
景気づけにがっつり食べちゃうから！
translation:
No way! Actually, I'm super hungry!
I'm going to eat a lot to cheer myself up!

japanese:
一応、病み上がりでしょ？
さすがにガッツリはやめときなさい。
translation:
But you're still recovering from your illness, right?
You should probably avoid eating too much.

japanese:
これなんていいんじゃないかな？
ポークたまごおにぎり。
沖縄では朝ご飯に食べるみたい。
translation:
How about this? Pork and egg rice balls.
They're apparently eaten for breakfast in Okinawa.

japanese: おー！　ご当地感があっていいね。
translation: Oh! It has a local feel to it. Nice!

japanese:
フルーツとか生タルトとか、デザートも買ってきたわ。
飲み物も、さんぴん茶やジュースがあるから。
translation:
We also bought some fruits, fresh tarts,
and drinks like sanpin-cha and juice.

japanese:
な、なかなかの量だな。
食いきれるか？
translation:
Th-that's a lot of food.
Can we finish it all?

japanese: 問題ありません！
translation: No problem!

japanese: （……たった一言なのにすごい説得力だ）
translation:
(...Even though Itsuki said a couple words,
 they were very convincing.)

japanese:
二乃が食べてるやつ、美味しそー！
１個、もらっちゃいまーす。
translation:
Wow, what Nino's eating looks delicious!
I'm gonna take one.

japanese:
ああっ！？
たくさん買ってきたんだから、
ちゃんと自分のを食べなさいよ！
translation:
Oh, come on!
We bought plenty, you can eat your own!

japanese:
だって美味しそうだったんだもん。
さーて、次はどれをいっちゃおっかな？
translation: But it looked so tasty! Now, what should I eat next?

japanese:
そういえば四葉さん、かき氷も買ってたよね？
早く食べないと溶けちゃうよ？
translation:
Oh, right! Yotsuba-san, didn't you buy shaved ice?
You need to eat it quickly before it melts.

japanese: あーーー！　そうでしたっ！
translation: Ah! That's right!

japanese:
あはは！
もう水になっちゃってるんじゃない？
translation: Ahaha! It's probably turned into water by now, huh?

japanese: やめたほうがいいって言ったのに。
translation: I told you not to get it.

japanese: せめて凍らせたフルーツにすればよかったのでは？
translation: We should have bought frozen fruit instead, right?

japanese:
へー、そんなのも売ってるんだ。
沖縄ってフルーツが豊富だもんね。
translation:
Wow, they sell that here too?
Okinawa has such an abundance of fruits.

japanese:
（一花もみんなも楽しそうだな。
　一時はどうなるかと思ったけど、安心だ）
translation:
(Ichika and everyone seem to be having fun.
 I was worried for a moment, but I'm relieved now.)

japanese:
上杉君？
なにをニヤニヤしているんですか？
translation:
Uesugi-kun?
Why are you grinning like that?

japanese: いや、美味しそうだと思って。
translation: Nah, I just thought it looked delicious.

japanese: でしたら遠慮なくどうぞ。
translation: Then, please help yourself.

japanese:
ここにある食べ物は、一花のお見舞いと
上杉君への感謝の気持ちですから。
translation:
The food here serves as Ichika's get-well present,
and is also our way to thank you, Uesugi-kun.

japanese: おう、いただくよ。
translation: Yep, I'll dive in.

japanese:
足りないようでしたら言ってくださいね。
ひとっ走り、買いに行ってきます！
translation:
If you need more, please let me know.
I'll go and buy some for you!

japanese:
一花が元気になってよかったって、
そう思ってただけだ。
translation: I'm really glad Ichika is feeling better.

japanese: あはは、ご心配おかけしました。
translation: Ahaha, sorry for making you worry.

japanese: 大きな病気でなくて、本当に良かったです。
translation: I'm so relieved that it wasn't a serious illness.

japanese: こうしてちゃんと食べられてるのなら安心。
translation: It's good to see you eating properly.

japanese: むしろ今度は食べすぎで倒れたりしてね。
translation: Just be careful not to overdo it and get sick yourself.

japanese: 気をつけまーす。
translation: I'll be careful.

japanese: 上杉君も、遠慮せずにどうぞ。
translation: Uesugi-kun, don't hesitate to take more if you want to.

japanese:
もたもたしてると
一花に全部食べられちゃいますよー？
translation: If you take too long, Ichika will eat it all!

japanese: おう、いただくよ。
translation: Yep, I'll dive in.

japanese: なんつーか、いい光景だと思ってさ。
translation: I was thinking how nice of a scene this is.
Huh...?

japanese:
お前らがこうして揃って、笑い合ってる。
見慣れちまってたけど、決して当たり前なんかじゃ
ないんだよな、これは。
translation:
When you're all together, laughing and having fun.
I guess I've gotten used to it,
but it's not something that's always guaranteed.

japanese: ……今度は上杉君が体調を崩してます？
translation: ...Now is it YOU who's sick, Uesugi-kun?
Ooh...

japanese:
（た、確かに、ついキザなことを言ってしまった。
　これも旅行のテンションってやつか？）
translation:
(Yeah, I guess I said something corny just now.
 Is it because of the trip's mood?)

japanese: いまのは聞かなかったことにしてくれ……。
translation: Please pretend you didn't hear that...

japanese: 聞いちゃったもんねー。
translation: But I did hear it.

japanese: 一花っ！？
translation: Ichika?!

japanese:
別に恥ずかしがることないよ。
だって、私も君と同じことを感じたから。
translation:
I don't see why you should be embarrassed about it.
After all, I felt the same way as you did.

japanese:
当たり前なんかじゃない。
だから、大切にしていかなくちゃ。
translation:
It's not something that's always guaranteed.
That's why we have to cherish it.

japanese: ……ああ。
translation: ...Yeah.
